event: Within the first 3 days of SNF admission
question: Did the patient have difficulty focusing attention, for example being easily distractible, or having difficulty keeping track of what was being said?

event: Within the first 3 days of SNF admission
question: Did the resident have altered level of consiousness as indicated by any of the following criteria: (1) Vigilant - startles easily to any sound or touch, (2) Lethargic - repeatedly dozed off when being asked questions, but responded to voice or touch, (3) Stuporous - very difficult to arouse and keep aroused for the interview, (4) Comatose - could not be aroused
